item.title: MacBook 被曝将配备触控屏
item.guid: MacBook-被曝将配备触控屏
item.description:
Yesterday, analyst Ming-Chi Kuo posted that MacBooks are expected to adopt touchscreens next year, and the boundaries with iPads will further blur. 昨日，分析师郭明錤发文表示，MacBook 预计会在明年用上触控屏，并且会与 iPad 的边界进一步模糊。

Kuo Ming-Chi analyzed that the biggest reason for touchscreens on MacBooks is that Apple has observed iPad user behavior for many years and found that in certain usage scenarios, touch operations can improve productivity and user experience. 郭明錤分析称，MacBook 上触控屏的最大原因是因为苹果观察了 iPad 用户多年来的行为表现，发现某些使用场景下，触控操作能改善生产力和用户体验。

According to Ming-Chi Kuo, the OLED MacBook Pro, mass-produced by the end of 2026, will be the first MacBook to feature a touchscreen and will adopt On-Cell screen touch technology; while the cheaper MacBook, mass-produced in Q4 2025, will not offer a touchscreen, but the second generation, expected to be mass-produced in 2027, might have hope, with specifications currently under discussion. 据郭明錤透露，2026 年底量产的 OLED MacBook Pro 将成为首款搭载触控屏的 MacBook，并且采用 On-Cell 屏幕触控技术；而 2025 年第四季度量产的廉价版 MacBook 将不提供触控屏，但预计 2027 年量产的二代或有希望，目前规格还在商讨。

According to a June report by "hankooki", Samsung's 8.6-generation OLED production line can support the production of larger glass substrates, thus better providing screens for large-sized devices such as laptops and tablets. 据「hankooki」6 月报道，三星 8.6 代 OLED 产线能支持更大尺寸的玻璃基板生产，因此能更好提供笔记本、平板电脑等大尺寸设备的屏幕生产。

According to a recent report by Korean media ETNews, Apple is considering equipping iPhones with variable aperture technology. Previously, some media reported that this year's iPhone 17 Pro series might feature it, but the technology has not been seen on the new devices. 另据韩媒 ETNews 日前报道，苹果考虑在 iPhone 上搭载可变光圈技术。此前曾有媒体报道，今年 iPhone 17 Pro 系列或会配备，而如今并未在新机身上见到该技术。

ETNews pointed out that Apple is pushing for massive performance improvements for the iPhone's 20th-anniversary edition, including considering whether to apply variable aperture. ETNews 指出，苹果正在为 iPhone 推出 20 周年纪念版而推进大规模性能提升，其中包括考虑是否应用可变光圈。

item.title: 彭博社：马云回归，阿里重启创始人模式
item.guid: 彭博社：马云回归，阿里重启创始人模式
item.description:
According to recent reports from Bloomberg and Z Finance, after several years of stagnation, Alibaba's internal forum once flashed with a slogan that was both jocular and inspiring — "MAGA" (i.e., "Make Alibaba Great Again"). And the MAGA dream seems to have found its most powerful executor: Jack Ma. 据彭博社和 Z Finance 日前报道，在经历数年消沉之后，阿里巴巴的内部论坛上，一度闪烁着一句既戏谑又振奋的口号 ——「MAGA」（即「Make Alibaba Great Again（让阿里巴巴再次伟大））。而 MAGE 梦想似乎找到了最有力的执行者：马云。

Having faded from public view since 2020, Jack Ma is returning to Alibaba after five years. According to sources, the 61-year-old is reappearing in Alibaba's campus, and his level of involvement is unusually deep for the past five years. 自 2020 年淡出公众视野，马云时隔 5 年正重返阿里巴巴。据知情人士透露，现年 61 岁的他正重新出现在阿里园区，且参与程度之深，为近五年来罕见。

The report points out that Jack Ma's "invisible hand" is continuously emerging: pushing Alibaba's transformation into the AI field and confronting JD.com/Meituan in e-commerce. Sources revealed that Jack Ma decided to invest subsidies of up to 50 billion RMB at Alibaba to fend off attacks from JD.com and Meituan. 报道指出，马云「无形之手」的力量正不断显现：助推阿里像人工智能领域转型、在电商领域与京东/美团对抗。知情人士透露，马云在阿里决定投入高达 500 亿人民币的补贴，以抵御京东、美团的攻势。

To outsiders, Jack Ma's return is not only an internal signal for Alibaba but also possibly a symbol of China's tech industry regaining policy favor. Unlike before, this time Jack Ma is keeping a low profile, no longer frequently appearing on global stages like Davos, nor serving as a judge on overseas programs. 在外界看来，马云的回归不仅是阿里内部的信号，更可能是中国科技行业重新得到政策青睐的象征。与以往不同，这一次马云保持低调，不再频繁现身达沃斯等全球舞台，也不再担任海外节目评委。

But reality is already different. Alibaba's market share is no longer 85% as it was during its peak; the new battlegrounds are express delivery, local services, and instant retail. As of July this year, Alibaba's share in the food delivery market was 43%, closely trailing Meituan's 47%. Jack Ma firmly believes that Taobao and local life services still have a chance to overtake. 但现实已然不同。阿里的市场份额早已不再是鼎盛时期的 85%，新的战场是极速配送、本地生活与即时零售。截至今年 7 月，阿里在外卖市场的份额为 43%，紧追美团的 47%。而马云坚信，淘宝和本地生活业务仍有机会反超。

Today, Jack Ma is betting on three core comrades: Eddie Wu, Joe Tsai, and Jiang Fan. Wu is considered the long-term helmsman, especially with an advantage in the AI field; Tsai stabilizes the capital market; and Jiang Fan is responsible for reshaping the e-commerce landscape, with operations already covering from Singapore to Istanbul. 如今，马云押注于三位核心战友：吴泳铭、蔡崇信和蒋凡。吴被认为是长期掌舵者，尤其在 AI 领域有优势；蔡崇信稳固资本市场；蒋凡则负责重塑电商版图，业务已覆盖新加坡到伊斯坦布尔。

It is reported that Eddie Wu is leading Alibaba into the race for "general artificial intelligence." In February this year, Alibaba announced that it would invest 380 billion RMB over the next three years in AI and cloud infrastructure. Although the commercialization of AI is still in its early stages, Alibaba Cloud's revenue grew by 26% in the second quarter of this year, marking its fastest growth in several years. 据悉，吴泳铭正带领阿里投入「通用人工智能」的竞赛。今年 2 月，阿里宣布未来三年将斥资 3800 亿元人民币用于 AI 与云基础设施。虽然 AI 的商业化仍在起步阶段，但今年二季度，阿里云收入增长 26%，创下数年来最快增速。

Boosted by this, Alibaba's stock price has risen 88% year-to-date, reaching a market capitalization of 380 billion USD, though still less than half of its peak. 受此提振，阿里股价今年累计上涨 88%，市值达 3800 亿美元，虽仍不足巅峰的一半。

The report also revealed that during an Alibaba Cloud business visit in April this year, Jack Ma mentioned that he receives daily updates on these technologies. "Technology is not just about conquering the stars and the sea; it's about sustaining the passion in each of us." Some employees who participated in the event said it felt like witnessing the work culture of a startup on its very first day. 报道还透露，马云在今年 4 月的一次阿里云业务访问活动中，提到自己每天都在接收关于这些技术的最新更新。「技术不仅仅是征服星辰大海，它关乎到维持我们每个人的热情。」而部分参与了相关活动的员工表示，仿佛亲眼见证了初创公司第一天的工作文化。

In the core e-commerce business, Jack Ma also supported replacing the CEO last year, ending Daniel Zhang's "six major spin-offs" strategy. During his tenure, Zhang invested heavily in the hypermarket business, which ultimately proved to be a misjudgment. As Pinduoduo's market value once surpassed Alibaba's, Jack Ma posted on an internal forum, directly stating the need to "correct deviations" and reshape direction. Now, Jiang Fan has returned to the core power layer, integrating e-commerce, food delivery, hotels, and logistics to form a new unified system. 在电商主业上，马云去年还支持更换 CEO，结束了张勇时期的「六大分拆」战略。张勇在任内斥巨资押注大卖场业务，最终证明是误判。随着拼多多市值一度超越阿里，马云在内部论坛上发帖直言要「纠偏」，重塑方向。如今，蒋凡重回核心权力层，整合电商、外卖、酒店与物流，形成新的统一体系。

To some industry insiders, Jack Ma's return is more like the "last stand" of a first-generation internet entrepreneur. The report states that while it's unlikely he will resume a formal title, Jack Ma now enters the campus still wearing his Alibaba employee badge, symbolizing his "presence." As he said when he handed over the reins years ago: "Retirement does not mean leaving Alibaba. If Alibaba needs me, I will always be there." 而在一些业内人士看来，马云的回归更像是一位第一代互联网创业者的「最后一战」。报道称，虽然不太可能恢复正式头衔，但如今马云走进园区，仍会佩戴阿里工牌，象征着他的「现身」。正如他当年交棒时所言：「退休不等于离开阿里。如果阿里需要我，我永远都会在。」

item.title: DeepSeek-R1 论文登上 Nature 封面
item.guid: DeepSeek-R1-论文登上-Nature-封面
item.description:
Yesterday, the latest issue of 《Nature》 featured research from the DeepSeek team on its cover — "DeepSeek-R1: Incentivizing Reasoning Capability in LLMs via Reinforcement Learning." The corresponding author of this paper is Liang Wenfeng . 昨天，最新一期《Nature》封面刊登了 DeepSeek 团队的研究成果 ——「DeepSeek-R1: Incentivizing Reasoning Capability in LLMs via Reinforcement Learning」。该论文的通讯作者为 梁文锋 。

In its recommended introduction, 《Nature》 points out that if large models can plan the steps needed to solve a problem, they often perform tasks better. This "reasoning" approach is similar to how humans tackle complex problems but is extremely challenging for artificial intelligence. DeepSeek-R1's research demonstrates how models can gradually learn to reason through reinforcement learning with minimal human annotation. 在推荐介绍中，《Nature》指出，如果大模型能够规划解决问题所需的步骤，它们往往能更好地完成任务。这种「推理」方式与人类处理复杂问题的思路类似，但对人工智能而言极具挑战。DeepSeek-R1 的研究展示了如何在极少人工标注的情况下，通过强化学习让模型逐步学会推理。

DeepSeek-R1's training method is as follows: the model receives a reward when it correctly solves a mathematical problem and a penalty when it answers incorrectly. As training progresses, the model not only gradually learns to reason but also develops self-verification and reflection capabilities, thereby demonstrating stronger performance in programming and graduate-level scientific problems. DeepSeek-R1 的训练方式是：模型在正确解答数学问题时获得奖励，答错则受到惩罚。随着训练深入，模型不仅能逐步推理，还具备了自我验证与反思能力，从而在编程和研究生水平的科学问题上展现出更强表现。

It is worth noting that R1 is considered the first large language model to pass peer review by an authoritative academic journal. Hugging Face engineer Lewis Tunstall commented: "This is a welcome precedent. Without such norms for openly sharing the R&D process, it would be difficult for us to assess the potential risks of these systems." 值得注意的是，R1 被认为是首个通过权威学术期刊同行评审的大语言模型。Hugging Face 工程师 Lewis Tunstall 评论称：「这是一个备受欢迎的先例。如果缺乏这种公开分享研发过程的规范，我们将很难评估这些系统的潜在风险。」

Huan Sun, a researcher at Ohio State University, also stated: "Undergoing rigorous peer review undoubtedly effectively verifies the model's reliability and practical value. Other companies should also follow suit." 俄亥俄州立大学研究员 Huan Sun 也表示：「经历严格的同行评审，无疑能有效验证模型的可靠性与实用价值。其他公司也应效仿此举。」

Industry insiders believe that this is not only a scientific breakthrough but also an important step for the AI industry towards "scientific discipline." The peer review mechanism will force companies to shift from "self-promotion" to "evidence and reproducibility," helping to curb industry chaos and build public trust. 业内人士认为，这不仅是一次科研突破，更是 AI 行业迈向「科学纪律」的重要一步。同行评审机制将迫使企业从「自我宣传」转向「证据与复现」，有助于遏制行业乱象并建立公众信任。

item.title: OpenAI 也要整「未成年保护」
item.guid: OpenAI-也要整「未成年保护」
item.description:
Recently, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman published a lengthy article titled "Teen safety, freedom, and privacy," announcing its latest initiatives aimed at providing a safe online environment for teenagers while enabling them to responsibly explore new technologies. 日前，OpenAI CEO Sam Altman 发布长文《Teen safety, freedom, and privacy》（青少年安全、自由与隐私），公布了其最新举措，旨在为青少年提供一个安全的在线环境，同时让他们能够负责任地探索新技术。

The most important aspect is youth safety protection. Altman emphasized in the article that minors need full protection in the face of AI, a novel and powerful technology. OpenAI has provided some protection solutions: 其中最重点的即青少年安全保护。Altman 在文中强调，在 AI 这一新颖且强大的技术面前，未成年人需要得到十足的保护。OpenAI 方面给出了部分保护方案：

    Distinguishing underage users: OpenAI states that ChatGPT is designed for people aged 13 and above, and they are building a detection system that estimates user age based on usage habits. In some regions, OpenAI will even implement "real-name" internet access.

    ChatGPT will offer a "minor mode": When requested to enable a "minor mode," ChatGPT will not generate content involving flirting or suicidal tendencies; if a minor shows suicidal tendencies, it will even contact the user's parents or local police.

    Additionally, parents can set disabled time periods during which teenage users linked to a family account cannot use ChatGPT.

According to a recent Bloomberg report, the father of a teenager who died by suicide this spring testified before Congress, stating that ChatGPT "induced" his 16-year-old son to commit suicide, and accused OpenAI of prioritizing product iteration speed and market share over youth safety. 据彭博社日前报道，一名在今年春天自杀身亡少年的父亲，在国会作证时表示，ChatGPT「诱导」其 16 岁的儿子走向自杀，并指控 OpenAI 把产品迭代速度和市场份额置于青少年安全之上。

item.title: 工信微报：一定程度帮驾驶者完成「开车」才算驾驶自动化
item.guid: 工信微报：一定程度帮驾驶者完成「开车」才算驾驶自动化
item.description:
Yesterday, the official government new media account of the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology, "MIIT Micro-Report," published an article explaining related questions such as "What is 'driving assistance'?" and "What constitutes 'autonomous driving'?" 昨日，工业和信息化部官方政务新媒体账号「工信微报」发布发文，解释了「什么是『驾驶辅助』？」「怎样才算『自动驾驶』？」等相关问题。

The article points out that "driving automation" means the vehicle can assist the driver to a certain extent in completing the task of "driving," ranging from reminding the driver of前方 risks, to assisting with following and lane changes, and even completely driving the vehicle under certain conditions, all falling within the scope of "driving automation." 文章中指出，「驾驶自动化」就是车辆能够在一定程度上帮助驾驶员完成「开车」这项任务，从提醒驾驶员注意前方风险，到辅助跟车、辅助换道，甚至在某些条件下完全驾驶车辆，都属于「驾驶自动化」的范畴。

The MIIT Micro-Report states that, according to national standards, the core distinctions in driving automation levels are threefold: the extent to which the driving automation system can perform dynamic driving tasks, the allocation of roles between the system and the driver, and the presence or absence of design operational domain limitations. Simply put, the core question is whether "driving" is the responsibility of a human or the system. 工信微报表示，根据国家标准，驾驶自动化等级的核心区别有三个方面：驾驶自动化系统能够执行动态驾驶任务的程度、系统与驾驶人之间的角色分配、有无设计运行范围限制。简单来说，核心就是「开车」这件事到底是人负责，还是系统负责。

Currently, according to national standards, driving automation is divided into six levels, from L0 to L5: 目前，根据国家标准，驾驶自动化分成 L0 至 L5 六个等级：

    L0: The system can detect the external driving environment or the status of occupants inside the vehicle, providing safety-related prompts and warnings, requiring the driver's attention or appropriate action; or, in some emergency situations, the system performs brief lateral or longitudinal motion control. (e.g., lane departure warning, automatic emergency braking, etc.)

    L1: Under specific design operating conditions, the system can provide continuous motion assistance control for the vehicle in a single direction, either laterally or longitudinally, reducing some of the driver's burden; the driver cannot disengage from vehicle control and must remain constantly aware of the driving environment to respond to any unexpected situations. (e.g., lane centering control, adaptive cruise control, etc.)

    L2: Under specific design operating conditions, the system can simultaneously provide continuous lateral and longitudinal motion assistance control, reducing some of the driver's burden; the driver still needs to constantly monitor the driving environment, maintain control of the vehicle, and respond to any unexpected situations. (e.g., lever-actuated lane change assist, navigation-assisted driving assist, etc.)

    L3: Under specific design operating conditions, the system can achieve autonomous driving, meaning it performs all driving tasks, thereby allowing the user to disengage from driving tasks under those conditions; the user must still maintain the ability to take over and promptly respond to special situations that the system cannot handle.

    L4: Under specific design operating conditions, the system can achieve autonomous driving without user intervention and can automatically reach a minimum risk state when necessary. It has two modes: without human driving controls (the user is merely a passenger, with no possibility of driving the vehicle) and with human driving controls (although user intervention is not required, the user can manually drive the vehicle if needed).

    L5: Under any drivable conditions, the system can achieve autonomous driving without user intervention and can reach a minimum risk state when necessary; the system is not restricted by design operating domains; its performance in general driving processes is like that of a professional driver; and in terms of continuous driving and emergency handling, it surpasses the limits achievable by humans.

item.title: 李飞飞的创业公司发布空间智能模型最新成果
item.guid: 李飞飞的创业公司发布空间智能模型最新成果
item.description:
Yesterday, World Labs, a startup founded by Stanford University Professor Fei-Fei Li, officially launched its latest spatial intelligence research achievement: Marble. 昨日，斯坦福大学教授李飞飞的创业公司 World Labs 正式上线了空间智能最新研究成果：Marble。

❗ It's launched, but not fully launched: Currently, Marble is a limited-access Beta testing platform where users can browse and create 3D worlds at the official website (marble.worldlabs.ai). ❗ 上线了，但没有完全上线：目前 Marble 是一个限量访问的 Beta 测试版平台，用户可以在官网地址（ marble.worldlabs.ai）浏览和创建 3D 世界。

After the results were announced, Fei-Fei Li herself posted, "This is an incredibly vast world created using our 3D world generation model. It amazes me!" 成果公布后，李飞飞本人发文表示「这是使用我们的 3D 世界生成模型创建的一个极其庞大的世界。这让我惊叹不已！」

From a technical perspective, what World Labs' Marble aims to achieve is: 从技术层面看，World Labs 的 Marble 要实现的是：

Give AI a photo, and let it "imagine" the geometric structure of the entire scene—which surfaces are flat, which are convex or concave, the spatial relationships between objects, depth, lighting, materials, textures, etc. This includes estimating the implicit depth map and geometric boundaries in the scene, then generating a 3D world that can be explored at any time.

The key is that this world is permanently persistent, won't deform, and won't show inconsistencies. Compared to previous technological achievements, the generated worlds are now larger, more diverse in style, and have clearer 3D geometric structures. 关键是这个世界是永久持续的，不会变形，也不会出现不一致的情况。相比之前的技术成果，现在的生成世界更大、风格更多样，三维几何结构也更清晰。

Even more thoughtfully, in Marble, creators can also export the generated worlds as Gaussian splats and apply them in subsequent projects. 更贴心的是，在 Marble 里，创作者还可以将生成的世界导出为 Gaussian splats，并应用在后续项目中。

The open-source rendering library Spark, provided by World Labs, can seamlessly integrate Gaussian splats into Three.js to build web-based 3D experiences, and it can run efficiently on desktops, laptops, mobile devices, and VR headsets. World Labs 提供的开源渲染库 Spark 可以无缝整合 Gaussian splats 到 Three.js 中，用于搭建基于网页的 3D 体验，并且能在台式机、笔记本、移动设备和 VR 头显上高效运行。

It's a pity that Marble currently focuses on generating 3D environments and cannot handle people or animals, so "selfie enthusiasts and pet owners" will be temporarily disappointed. And although it can generate "room-sized" worlds, building truly large-scale game scenes may require more technological breakthroughs. 比较遗憾的是Marble 目前专注于生成 3D 环境，还搞不定人物或动物，所以「自拍爱好者和萌宠主人」暂时要失望了。而且虽然能生成「房间大小」的世界，但要构建真正的大型游戏场景，可能还需要更多技术突破。

🔗 Related reading: Just now, Fei-Fei Li released new world model results! One image generates a 3D world, playable now. 🔗 相关阅读：刚刚，李飞飞发布世界模型新成果！一张图生成 3D 世界，现在就能玩

item.title: 前荣耀 CEO 赵明回应离职后去向
item.guid: 前荣耀-CEO-赵明回应离职后去向
item.description:
According to Sina Tech, Zhao Ming, former CEO of Honor Terminal Co., Ltd., stated at Fudan University's "Leader Changer Forum" when discussing his future career plans after resignation, that all rumors about where he's going are groundless. 据新浪科技报道，前荣耀终端有限公司 CEO 赵明在复旦大学「领变者论坛」上，谈到离职后谈未来职业规划时表示，外面传的他去哪儿，所有的都是捕风捉影。

Zhao Ming stated that he hadn't even talked to people from these companies, saying, "I'm very familiar with Yiming (Zhang Yiming), but the two of us can't do this." He also clarified that there's nothing with Zhijie either, and it seems there's market speculation every month, or even less than a month. 赵明表示，他连跟这些公司的人都没聊过，其称「我和一鸣（张一鸣）很熟的，但是我们俩弄不了这个事情」。他也澄清，包括智界，也什么都没有，每隔不到一个月，每个月好像必有市场通风。

Zhao Ming said that after taking a break, he is now looking for something in the industry that excites him even more, "something worth investing ten years or even longer into, more so than when I was at Honor." 赵明表示，在重新休息了一段时间之后，也在看行业当中有让他更加兴奋，「比当年做荣耀，值得我再去投入十年甚至更久的时间去做的事儿。」

In January this year, Zhao Ming, then CEO of Honor, announced his official resignation on Weibo. He stated in Honor's internal community that he chose to resign due to poor health caused by high-intensity work. 今年 1 月，当时身为荣耀 CEO 的赵明在微博发文宣布正式离职。其在荣耀内部社区表示，因高强度的工作导致身体情况不佳而选择离职。

item.title: 华为发布「4+10+N」中小企业智能化方案
item.guid: 华为发布「4+10+N」中小企业智能化方案
item.description:
On September 17, Huawei released the Kunling "4+10+N" intelligent solution for SMEs, aiming to help small and medium-sized enterprises bridge the "last mile" towards an intelligent world with a one-stop, scenario-based solution: 9 月 17 日，华为发布了坤灵「4+10+N」中小企业智能化方案，以一站式场景化方案助力中小企业打通迈向智能世界的「最后一公里」：

    "4" refers to the 4 major core scenarios closely related to enterprise production and operation activities: smart office, smart business, smart education, and smart healthcare;

    "10" refers to 10 major one-stop scenario-based solutions, including SME office, smart hotel, digital diagnosis and treatment platform, smart interactive classroom, etc.;

    "N" refers to a series of star products defined around the four major scenarios. This time, Huawei released 26 star products for the distribution market, including the AR180 enterprise-grade wireless router, which integrates multiple functions such as routing, switching, Wi-Fi 7, and VPN, as well as products like IdeaHub, which combines AI conferencing, intelligent sound curtain, and smart applications, providing a full range of products with minimalist integration, interactive intelligence, and comprehensive security for the four major scenarios.

At the conference, Huawei also launched the "Hundred & Million Plan" for its Chinese distribution partners, aiming to develop 100 diamond partners from capable and willing gold distributors, expanding from single-product authorization to full-product authorization, to help partners grow rapidly and scale up. 会上，华为还发布了面向中国分销伙伴的「百&万计划」，将从有能力、有意愿的分销金牌中发展 100 家钻石伙伴，从单产品授权扩展至全产品授权，帮助伙伴快速发展，做大规模。

At the same time, Huawei also collaborated with diamond and gold partners to develop 10,000 elite engineering service providers, offering scenario-based solutions and services to end-users, enabling them to serve users more efficiently. 同时，华为还协同钻石与金牌伙伴发展 10000 家精英工程商，面向最终用户提供场景化方案及服务，使能工程商更高效服务用户。

item.title: 岚图汽车股改更名
item.guid: 岚图汽车股改更名
item.description:
On September 15, Voyah Automobile Technology Co., Ltd. completed its industrial and commercial change, officially renaming itself "Voyah Automobile Technology Co., Ltd." and changing its enterprise type to a joint-stock company (unlisted). 9 月 15 日，岚图汽车科技有限公司完成工商变更，正式更名为「岚图汽车科技股份有限公司」，企业类型变更为股份有限公司（非上市）。

It is reported that this change is a crucial step for Voyah Automobile to list on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange by way of introduction, marking the steady progress of Voyah's Hong Kong stock listing process. 据悉，此次变更是岚图汽车以介绍方式赴香港联交所上市的关键一步，标志着岚图港股上市进程稳步推进。

On August 22, according to an announcement issued by Dongfeng Motor Group Co., Ltd., Voyah Automobile Technology Co., Ltd. will be listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange by way of introduction, marking another milestone in its high-quality development. Since announcing its planned Hong Kong listing on August 22, Voyah Automobile has made full efforts in three dimensions: technology, products, and market, demonstrating strong development momentum and strategic execution. 8 月 22 日，据东风汽车集团股份有限公司发布的公告，岚图汽车科技有限公司将以介绍方式登陆香港联交所，高质量发展再迎里程碑。自 8 月 22 日宣布拟港股上市以来，岚图汽车在技术、产品与市场三大维度全面发力，展现出强劲的发展势头与战略执行力。

In terms of market performance, Voyah Automobile's delivery volume continues to rise: 市场表现方面，岚图汽车交付量持续走高：

    In 2024, Voyah Motors delivered 85,697 vehicles, a year-on-year increase of approximately 70%;

    From January to August 2025, cumulative deliveries reached 81,768 vehicles, a year-on-year increase of 92%. In August alone, deliveries reached 13,505 vehicles, a year-on-year increase of 119%, achieving seven consecutive months of growth, setting a new historical record, and demonstrating strong growth resilience and brand momentum;

    As of August this year, Voyah Motors has achieved monthly deliveries exceeding 10,000 vehicles for 6 consecutive months.

item.title: Google 推出 AI 学习工具项目，能将专业内容重构
item.guid: Google-推出-AI-学习工具项目，能将专业内容重构
item.description:
Recently, Google announced a research experiment called "Learn Your Way," which aims to reconstruct static textbook materials through artificial intelligence, transforming them into interactive experiences that every student can participate in. 近期，Google 公布了其一项研究实验「Learn Your Way」，旨在通过人工智能重构静态教科书材料，转化为每个学生都能参与的互动体验。

According to reports, Learn Your Way is driven by learning science and Google's LearnLM model, and has now been integrated into Gemini 2.5 Pro. This feature can adjust content based on the learner's chosen grade level and personal interests, and generate various representations from the original material, ranging from mind maps and audio lessons to interactive quizzes. 据介绍，Learn Your Way 基于学习科学和 Google 的 LearnLM 模型驱动，并且目前已经集成到了 Gemini 2.5 Pro。该功能能够根据学习者所选的年级和个人兴趣调整内容，并根据原始材料生成多种表示形式，从思维导图和音频课程到互动测验。

It is worth noting that quiz results can provide real-time feedback and further personalize content. Research shows that students using Learn Your Way scored 11 percentage points higher on long-term memory tests than students using standard digital readers. 值得一提的是，测验的结果能够实时反馈和进一步调整内容的个性化。而据研究，使用 Learn Your Way 的学生在长期记忆测试中得分比使用标准数字阅读器的学生高出了 11 个百分点。

item.title: 可灵 AI 首届全球新影像创作大赛上线
item.guid: 可灵-AI-首届全球新影像创作大赛上线
item.description:
Yesterday, Keling AI announced the official call for AI-generated video works from global creators, launching the "Keling AI NEXTGEN Global Video Creation Competition". 昨日，可灵 AI 宣布，正式面向全球创作者征集 AI 生成的视频作品，推出「可灵 AI NEXTGEN 全球影像创作大赛」。

It is understood that this competition focuses on the integration of technology and narrative, with no thematic restrictions, encouraging creators to freely explore diverse expressions of AI imagery. Submissions are open until October 6, 2025. Participants must use Keling AI as their primary tool for creation, with a duration of 1-15 minutes, and individual or team participation is supported. 据了解，本次大赛聚焦技术与叙事的融合，不设主题限制，鼓励创作者自由探索 AI 影像的多元表达。作品征集截至 2025 年 10 月 6 日，参赛者需以可灵 AI 为主要工具进行创作，时长 1-15 分钟，支持个人或团队参与。

According to the official introduction, winning works can receive up to $15,000 in cash rewards and 500,000 inspiration points. Additionally, works honored with the "Best Image Award" and "New Talent Award" will have the opportunity for special screenings at the Canneseries and Tokyo International Film Festival. 官方介绍，获奖作品将最多可以获得 15000 美元现金奖励以及 500000 灵感值奖励。同时，荣获「最佳影像奖」及「新锐奖」的作品将有机会在戛纳电视节、东京国际电影节进行特别展映。

item.title: 💡 华为：AGI 将是未来十年最具变革性的驱动力量
item.guid: 💡-华为：AGI-将是未来十年最具变革性的驱动力量
item.description:
On September 16, Huawei officially released the Intelligent World 2035 series reports, including two major research achievements: "Intelligent World 2035" and "Global Digital Intelligence Index 2025". 9 月 16 日，华为正式发布智能世界 2035 系列报告，包括《智能世界 2035》和《全球数智化指数 2025》报告两大研究成果。

These achievements forecast key technological trends over the next decade and their changes and impacts on industries such as education, healthcare, finance, manufacturing, and power, while also helping countries worldwide quantify their digital intelligence development process. Among them, "Intelligent World 2035" released ten technological trends for the intelligent world of 2035: 本次成果展望了未来十年的关键技术趋势以及这些技术对教育、医疗、金融、制造、电力等行业带来的改变和影响，并帮助全球各国量化数智化发展进程。其中，《智能世界 2035》发布了面向智能世界 2035 的十大技术趋势：

    AGI will be the most transformative driving force in the next decade, but many core challenges still need to be overcome to achieve an AGI singularity breakthrough. Therefore, moving towards the physical world is the only way for AGI to form.

    With the development of large models, AI agents will evolve from execution tools to decision-making partners, driving industrial revolution.

    Development models are undergoing a transformation, with human-machine collaborative programming becoming mainstream. Humans will focus more on top-level design and innovative thinking, while delegating tedious coding execution tasks to efficient AI.

    Interaction methods are shifting from graphical interfaces to natural language, evolving towards multimodal interaction that integrates human five senses. Users interact with the digital world through voice, gestures, and other means, gaining a deeply immersive experience.

    With breakthroughs in key technologies such as world models, brand-new L4+ autonomous driving vehicles will enter people's lives, becoming a "mobile third space".

    By 2035, the total computing power of society will increase 100,000 times , and the computing field will break free from the constraints of the traditional Von Neumann architecture, achieving disruptive innovations in four core aspects: computing architecture, material devices, engineering processes, and computing paradigms, ultimately leading to the comprehensive rise of new computing.

    Data will become the "new fuel" driving the development of artificial intelligence. AI storage capacity demand will increase 500 times compared to 2025, accounting for over 70%, and Agentic AI will drive changes in storage paradigms.

    The connected objects of communication networks will expand from 9 billion people to 900 billion intelligent agents, achieving a leap from the mobile internet to the intelligent agent internet.

    Energy will become a core factor restricting the high-speed development of AI. By 2035, renewable energy will accelerate its replacement of traditional fossil fuels, and the proportion of new energy power generation will exceed 50%. At the same time, artificial intelligence will become the core of new energy systems, managing watts through tokens and real-time managing every joule of energy, thereby achieving a more dynamic and efficient power grid.

At the same time, the report also predicted how AI will help human society in 2035: 同时，报告还预测了 2035 年，AI 对人类社会的帮助：

    AI will help prevent over 80% of chronic diseases, shifting health management from "passive treatment" to "active prevention"; over 90% of Chinese households will own smart robots.

    Humanity will gradually enter an era of holographic living spaces, and home scenarios will undergo technology-driven immersive transformations.

    In the enterprise sector, autonomous decision-making organizations driven by AI Agents will reshape production paradigms. By 2035, AI adoption will exceed 85%, and AI can increase labor productivity by 60%. AI is fundamentally restructuring how enterprises create value through autonomous systems of "perception – analysis – decision – action."

item.title: Meta 正式推出全新一代智能眼镜
item.guid: Meta-正式推出全新一代智能眼镜
item.description:
Meta officially launched its new generation of smart glasses, "Meta Ray-Ban Display," and simultaneously unveiled the innovative interactive device "Meta Neural Band," bringing a new form factor to wearable devices. Meta 正式推出全新一代智能眼镜「Meta Ray-Ban Display」，并同步亮相创新交互设备「Meta Neural Band」，为可穿戴设备带来全新形态。

According to reports, the Meta Ray-Ban Display features a full-color, high-resolution lens display, supporting functions such as viewing messages, previewing photos, navigation, real-time captions, and translation, allowing users to complete daily operations without taking out their phones. The frames are available in standard and large sizes, and in black and sand colors, weighing 69 grams, with up to 6 hours of battery life, and come with a foldable charging case that extends total battery life to 30 hours. 据介绍，Meta Ray-Ban Display 搭载全彩高分辨率镜片显示屏，支持查看消息、预览照片、导航、实时字幕与翻译等功能，用户无需取出手机即可完成日常操作。镜框提供标准与大号两种尺寸，以及黑色与沙色两种配色，重量 69 克，续航可达 6 小时，并配备可折叠充电盒，总续航可延长至 30 小时。

The Meta Neural Band, included with the glasses, uses EMG (surface electromyography) technology to enable operations like swiping and tapping via wrist muscle signals, and will support handwriting input in the future. The wristband has an IPX7 waterproof rating and a single charge lasts up to 18 hours. 随眼镜附赠的 Meta Neural Band 采用 EMG（表面肌电）技术，可通过手腕肌肉信号实现滑动、点击等操作，未来还将支持手写输入。该腕带具备 IPX7 防水等级，单次续航最长 18 小时。

Regarding pricing, the new Meta Ray-Ban Display is priced at $799 (including glasses and wristband) and will first go on sale in select retail channels in the United States on September 30th, expanding to Canada, France, Italy, and the UK markets in early 2026. Meta stated that subsequent software updates will add new features such as a dedicated Instagram Reels app and EMG handwriting. The Verge experienced these glasses and stated that the Meta Ray-Ban Display is the best smart glasses they have ever used, "This is the closest we've come to what Google Glass promised a decade ago." 售价方面，本次 Meta Ray-Ban Display 新品售价 799 美元（含眼镜与腕带），将于 9 月 30 日率先在美国部分零售渠道开售，2026 年初扩展至加拿大、法国、意大利及英国市场。Meta 表示，后续将通过软件更新加入 Instagram Reels 专用应用、EMG 手写等新功能。The Verge 体验了这款眼镜，并表示 Meta Ray-Ban Display 是他们用过最好的智能眼镜，「这是我们距离谷歌眼镜十年前承诺的最近一步」。

item.title: 4788 元起，DJI Mini 5 Pro 发布
item.guid: 4788-元起，DJI-Mini-5-Pro-发布
item.description:
Yesterday, DJI officially released the brand-new 1-inch sensor all-around mini aerial photography drone, the DJI Mini 5 Pro, bringing the most powerful performance to date in the DJI Mini series. 昨日，DJI 大疆正式发布全新一英寸大底全能迷你航拍机 DJI Mini 5 Pro，带来了 DJI Mini 系列迄今为止最强大的性能表现。

The DJI Mini 5 Pro not only continues the lightweight and portable body design but also marks the Mini series' first adoption of a 1-inch large sensor camera. It also supports excellent features such as night-level omnidirectional active obstacle avoidance, lossless vertical shooting, 225° gimbal rotation, up to 20 km O4+ video transmission, and omnidirectional intelligent tracking. DJI Mini 5 Pro 不仅延续了轻巧便携的机身设计，更是 Mini 系列首次采用一英寸大底传感器相机，同时还支持夜景级全向主动避障、无损竖拍、225° 云台旋转、最长 20 公里 O4+ 图传以及全向智能跟随等出色功能。

In terms of imaging capabilities, the DJI Mini 5 Pro is equipped with a new image processing platform and intelligent algorithms, supporting 4K/60fps HDR video recording with a dynamic range of up to 14 stops. In normal mode, the DJI Mini 5 Pro can record 10-bit video using H.265 encoding, with the ISO limit increased to 12800; the ISO limit for D-Log M and HLG color modes is increased to 3200. 影像能力上，DJI Mini 5 Pro 搭载全新图像处理平台和智能算法，支持录制 4K/60fps HDR 视频，动态范围高达 14 级。在普通模式下，DJI Mini 5 Pro 能采用 H.265 编码录制 10-bit 视频，ISO 上限提升至 12800；D-Log M 和 HLG 色彩模式的 ISO 上限则提升至 3200。

Compared to the traditional digital zoom of previous Mini Pro series, the DJI Mini 5 Pro adds a 48mm high-quality medium telephoto mode, providing 2x zoom capability. The new drone also incorporates DJI's portrait optimization technology, delivering better portrait brightness, contrast, and skin tone performance. 相较以往 Mini Pro 系列的传统数码变焦，DJI Mini 5 Pro 新增了 48 毫米高画质中焦模式，带来 2 倍变焦能力；新机还结合了采用 DJI 人像优化技术，带来更出色的人像亮度、对比度和肤色表现。

In terms of hardware, the DJI Mini 5 Pro features an ultra-light, foldable body, palm-sized, and also has 42GB of large-capacity storage built-in. 硬件方面，DJI Mini 5 Pro 采用超轻可折叠机身，巴掌大小，机内还内置了 42GB 大容量存储。

Regarding obstacle avoidance, the DJI Mini 5 Pro's front features a forward-looking LiDAR, with a pair of fisheye lenses each at the front and rear for perception in front, behind, left, right, and above. The bottom is equipped with dual vision sensors and a 3D infrared sensor, enabling night-level omnidirectional active obstacle avoidance. 避障能力上，DJI Mini 5 Pro 机身正面搭载前视激光雷达，前后各配备一对鱼眼镜头，实现前后、左右和上方的感知，下方配备双目镜头和 3D 红外传感器，实现夜景级全向主动避障。

It's worth noting that, thanks to visual simultaneous localization and mapping (VIO) technology, the DJI Mini 5 Pro can remember flight routes in well-lit conditions, allowing it to take off confidently and return safely even without satellite signals. For satellite positioning, the DJI Mini 5 Pro uses L1+L5 dual-frequency GNSS technology, supporting more satellite reception. 值得一提的是，得益于视觉即时定位及地图构建技术，DJI Mini 5 Pro 可在光照条件良好的环境下记忆飞行路线，即使没有卫星信号，也能自信起飞，安全返航。在卫星定位方面，DJI Mini 5 Pro 采用 L1+L5 双频 GNSS 技术，支持更多卫星接收。

Regarding pricing, the DJI Mini 5 Pro series is available in 4 versions, with a starting price of 4788 RMB. 价格方面，DJI Mini 5 Pro 系列共有 4 个版本发售，起售价为 4788 元。

item.title: OPPO Find X9 提供全自动高像素照片拍摄
item.guid: OPPO-Find-X9-提供全自动高像素照片拍摄
item.description:
Yesterday, Zhou Yibao, product manager for the OPPO Find series, continued to tease the new Find X9 series and announced its new imaging capabilities. 昨日，OPPO Find 系列产品负责人周意保继续预热 Find X9 系列新机，并公布了 OPPO Find X9 系列的影像新能力。

It is reported that the OPPO Find X9 series will offer fully automatic high-pixel photo shooting capabilities. 据悉，OPPO Find X9 系列将提供全自动高像素照片拍摄能力。

Zhou Yibao introduced that in normal photo mode, the new phone does not require switching to other modes or manually opening any switches. As long as the default optical zoom points, lighting, and functional conditions allow, the Find X9 can capture a true 50-megapixel photo, complete with Hasselblad color tuning, Danxia colors, and ProXDR. 周意保介绍，新机在普通照片模式下，不需要切换到其他模式，也不必手动打开任何开关，只要在默认光变点、光线和功能条件允许的情况下，Find X9 就能拍出一张真正的 5000 万像素照片，同时哈苏影调、丹霞色彩、ProXDR 一应俱全。

He revealed that to achieve these capabilities, OPPO has launched a brand-new LUMO Super Pixel Engine, which systematically reconstructs the entire imaging pipeline: 其透露，为实现上述能力，OPPO 推出了全新的 LUMO 超像素引擎，对整个影像链路进行了系统性重构：

    Multi-frame strategy upgrade: no longer mechanical stacking, but intelligent differentiation of details and noise, actively retaining truly valuable parts;

    SoC rendering pipeline reconstruction: allowing each unit to perform its duties, maximize efficiency, break through bottlenecks in computing power, memory, and power consumption, and execute efficiently and quickly.

Meanwhile, the Find X9 Standard Edition will be equipped with the following capabilities: 同时，本次 Find X9 标准版将配备以下能力：

    The standard version features the exclusive Hasselblad quad-camera ultra-clear imaging system; Pro-grade Sony LYTIA flagship large-sensor, large-aperture main camera / large-sensor periscope telephoto lens;

    Industry's first full-link 4K ultra-clear Live Photos; Ultra-identical Danxia color reproduction lens / 10-bit 4K/120fps Log video.

Additionally, Chen Xi, Design Director of ColorOS, also unveiled the new desktop icons for ColorOS 16. According to him, the new icons add more details based on the original: incorporating the immersion and influence of "light field" and "color," and the outer contours are also more rounded and comfortable. 另外，ColorOS 设计总监陈希还公布了 ColorOS 16 的全新桌面图标。据其介绍，新图标在原有的基础上添加更多细节：加入了「光场」和「色彩」的浸染和影响，外轮廓也更加圆润和舒适。

item.title: vivo X300 Pro 支持 4K 120fps 杜比视界拍摄
item.guid: vivo-X300-Pro-支持-4K-120fps-杜比视界拍摄
item.description:
Yesterday, Vivo product manager Han Boxiao posted revealing the video shooting capabilities of the X300 Pro, which will support the following: 昨日，vivo 产品经理韩伯啸发文透露了 X300 Pro 的视频拍摄能力，将支持以下能力：

    Global debut of "4K 60fps Cinematic Portrait Video": achieved based on V3+ capabilities, featuring a newly upgraded portrait-priority strategy, supporting more beauty details; new cold gel and negative film styles added;

    Supports dual-focal length "4K 120fps Cinematic Slow Motion" / "4K 120fps Dolby Vision HDR";

    Additionally, it supports "4K 120fps 10-bit Log video," and this time Vivo Log fully supports the ACES professional color workflow.

Han Boxiao also stated that the Vivo X300 Pro supports CIPA 5.5-level professional stabilization on both the main and telephoto cameras, and has upgraded its high-cache EIS stabilization algorithm for better shooting stability. 韩伯啸还表示，vivo X300 Pro 在主摄和长焦端均支持 CIPA5.5 级专业防抖，并且升级了高缓存的 EIS 防抖算法，拍摄稳定性更好。

item.title: 小米平板 8 官宣本月发布
item.guid: 小米平板-8-官宣本月发布
item.description:
Yesterday, Xiaomi officially announced that it will release the new Xiaomi Pad 8 series this month. 昨日，小米正式宣布将在本月发布全新小米平板 8 系列。

According to the official introduction, the Xiaomi Pad 8 series will feature a classic 11.2-inch size, be equipped with a high-performance processor, and will also debut Xiaomi HyperOS 3, touted as "the new generation portable productivity flagship." 官方介绍，小米平板 8 系列将采用 11.2 英寸经典尺寸，搭载高性能处理器，同时还将首发小米澎湃 OS 3，号称「新一代便携生产力旗舰」。

Official images show that the new tablet will feature an equally wide bezel design on all four sides, with the front camera placed on the longer side of the screen; it will offer a floating keyboard with a trackpad and a new stylus. In terms of details, the stylus will adopt a brand-new exterior design. 从官方的图片显示，新平板将采用四边等宽的屏幕设计，前置摄像头将放置在屏幕长边处；将提供带触控板的悬浮键盘以及全新手写笔。从细节来看，该款手写笔将采用全新的外观设计。

item.title: 匹克否认全员降薪
item.guid: 匹克否认全员降薪
item.description:
Recently, the well-known sports brand Peak was exposed for "company-wide salary cuts," with online rumors suggesting a maximum reduction of 50%. According to Blue Whale News, several interviewed current employees confirmed that the salary cut was largely true and implemented in a tiered manner. 日前，知名运动品牌匹克近日被曝「全员降薪」，网传最高降幅可达 50%。据蓝鲸新闻报道，多位受访的在职员工证实了降薪一事基本属实，并按照梯度降薪。

According to reports, employees revealed that the reduction is consistent with the online screenshots: 据报道，员工方面透露，降幅与网传截图一致：

    Headquarters employees with salaries between 5,000-10,000 yuan will have a 10% pay cut, those with salaries between 10,000-20,000 yuan will have a 20% pay cut, and those with salaries above 20,000 yuan will have a 30% pay cut;

    Office staff at direct-operated branches will have a 50% pay cut, while terminal store employees remain unaffected.

The report states that the company's salary cut notification indicated that the matter had undergone thorough communication and solicitation of opinions. However, several interviewed employees stated that they only learned about the salary cut at a meeting four days before payday, with no official documents or one-on-one communication afterward. 报道称，公司的降薪通知表示降薪一事经过充分沟通和意见征集。但多位受访员工表示，发薪日前四天才开会得知降薪，会后无正式文件和一对一沟通。

It is reported that on September 17, Peak held an internal meeting to discuss relevant matters. At the meeting, the chairman stated that Peak's overall salary reduction was less than 10%, and it was not a company-wide pay cut. 据悉，9 月 17 日，匹克召开内部会议商讨相关事宜。会上董事长表示，匹克整体降薪幅度不到 10%，并非全员降薪。

item.title: 三顿半推出全新培育咖啡品种
item.guid: 三顿半推出全新培育咖啡品种
item.description:
Yesterday, coffee brand Saturnbird announced its successful cultivation of a new coffee variety, 'Saturnbird No. 1,' at its Yunnan plantation. 昨日，咖啡品牌三顿半公布其在云南种植园成功培育的全新咖啡品种「三顿半一号」。

According to official introduction, Saturnbird No. 1 was developed through artificial hybridization of Caturra and SL28, achieving a new flavor experience with low bitterness, low acidity, and prominent juiciness, while also possessing outstanding resistance to pests and diseases. 据官方介绍，三顿半一号通过 人工杂交卡杜拉和 SL28 ，获得低苦涩、低酸涩和突出果汁感的新风味体验，同时有着突出的抗病虫害能力。

The Saturnbird No. 1 plantation, covering an area of 360 mu, is located in Bangdong Dapo, Mangshi, Dehong, Yunnan, one of the earliest regions in China to cultivate coffee. Regarding cultivation conditions, Saturnbird No. 1 adopts organic farming standards (currently in the organic conversion period), refraining from using pesticides and chemical fertilizers, but instead revitalizing the soil through composting, mulching, intercropping, or biological control. 而三顿半一号的种植园，种植面积 360 亩，位于云南德宏芒市的邦董大坡，这里是中国最早开始种植咖啡的地区之一。终止条件上，三顿半一号采用有机种植标准（正处于有机转换期），不使用农药化肥，而是通过堆肥、覆盖、间作或生物防治，让土壤恢复活力。

This plantation series instant coffee, featuring 'Saturnbird No. 1,' uses a washed process + medium-dark roast, retaining the sweet aftertaste of Wogan oranges, black tea, and caramel sweetness. It is currently priced at 89 yuan (original price 129 yuan), with each box containing 8 capsules of 3g each. 本次采用「三顿半一号」的种植园系列即溶咖啡，采用水洗+偏深烘，保留沃柑回甘、红茶、焦糖甜感。目前售价为 89 元（原价 129 元），每盒拥有 8 颗 3g 装。

item.title: lululemon 网球系列焕新登场
item.guid: lululemon-网球系列焕新登场
item.description:
As the China season kicks off, the popularity of tennis is soaring. lululemon ambassadors Leylah Fernandez, Frances Tiafoe, and Ethan Quinn will join forces to compete in this year's tennis China season. 随着中国赛季拉开帷幕，网球的热度愈加高涨。lululemon 大使 Leylah Fernandez、Frances Tiafoe 与 Ethan Quinn 将携手征战本次网球中国赛季。

lululemon will also be launching a new tennis apparel collection soon, offering professional athletes and tennis enthusiasts versatile options that combine performance and style. Special tennis collection displays will be featured in stores in cities like Beijing, Shanghai, and Wuhan during the event. 而 lululemon 也将在近期推出全新网球系列服饰，为专业运动员与网球爱好者带来兼具性能与风格的多场景选择，并于赛事期间在北京、上海和武汉等城市门店呈现网球系列特别陈列。

For women's gear, the Textured Mesh Tennis Textured Mesh Sports Bra, modeled by Leylah Fernandez, features a unique four-way stretch textured mesh fabric and comes with built-in removable bra pads. For bottoms, options include the matching Textured Mesh Textured Mesh Tennis Skirt and the classic Varsity Pleated High-Waist Tennis Skirt, both with thoughtful silicone grip at the bottom of the inner shorts to prevent rolling up during intense movement. 女士装备方面， Leylah Fernandez 上身演绎的 Textured Mesh 网球纹理网面运动背心，采用四面弹性的独特纹理网面面料，并配有内置可拆卸胸垫。下装可选择同系列 Textured Mesh 纹理网面网球裙以及经典的 Varsity 风琴褶高腰网球裙，贴心的内衬底部硅胶设计，减少大幅度跑动造成的卷边上缩。

Male customers can choose between two styles: the Tennis Short-Sleeve T-shirt or the Sports Vest, both featuring mesh material in high-sweat areas for enhanced breathability. For bottoms, we recommend the matching Tennis Shorts or the Striped Mesh Tennis Striped Mesh Shorts worn by Frances Tiafoe. 男士客人可以选择 Tennis 网球短袖 T 恤或运动背心两种版型，易流汗部位特别使用网面材质，更加透气。下装推荐同系列 Tennis 网球短裤或由 Frances Tiafoe 上身的 Striped Mesh 网球条纹网面短裤。

For everyday wear, lululemon has also launched a series of tennis items that balance athletic elements with lifestyle aesthetics: the Cotton-Blend Tennis Cotton Blend Cable Knit Cardigan, Side-Pleat Side Pleated High-Waist Tennis Skirt, Steady State™ Crewneck Sweatshirt, and Racket Backpack with racket storage. 日常穿搭方面，lululemon 还推出了一系列兼顾运动元素与生活风格的网球单品：Cotton-Blend 网球棉混纺绞花针织开衫、Side-Pleat 侧边褶饰高腰网球裙、Steady State™ 圆领卫衣、Racket 带球拍收纳袋背包。

item.title: 星巴克中国创新科技中心发布数字化成果
item.guid: 星巴克中国创新科技中心发布数字化成果
item.description:
On September 17, Starbucks China Innovation and Technology Center (SITC) officially announced its digital construction achievements since its establishment and declared its relocation to a new site at the Shenzhen Hetao Sci-Tech Innovation Center. 9 月 17 日，星巴克中国创新科技中心（Starbucks China Innovation and Technology Center，简称 SITC）正式对外发布成立以来的数字化建设成果，并宣布迁入深圳河套科创中心新址。

Leo Luo, Vice President and Chief Technology Officer of Starbucks China, stated at the launch ceremony: 星巴克中国副总裁、首席技术官罗金鹏在发布仪式上表示：

In the future, empowered by AI technology, Starbucks will open up innovative opportunities for 'technology integrating humanity' in more scenarios, expanding our unique competitive advantages in stores, products, and partners like never before, creating richer new value for customers.

Since its inception, SITC has upheld the philosophy of 'technology integrating humanity.' Over the past two years, it has focused on three core areas—stores, products, and partners—using refined, personalized, and human-centered technological innovation to continuously empower Starbucks partners to better serve customers and deliver an experience that exceeds expectations. SITC 自成立之初便秉持「科技融合人文」理念，两年来，聚焦门店、产品和伙伴三大核心领域，以精细化、个性化和以人为本的科技创新，持续赋能星巴克伙伴更好地服务顾客，传递超越期待的星巴克体验。

To ensure the right content reaches the right people at the right time and in the right stores, SITC has invested in building electronic menu boards across Starbucks' national stores, creating a new communication interface for customers in the 'third place' experience, and shaping a personalized and warm digital 'third place' experience. Currently, most Starbucks China stores have completed upgrades and renovations, with only a very small number of stores restricted by conditions yet to be updated. 为了让对的内容，在对的时刻、对的门店，打动对的人，SITC 已在星巴克全国门店投资建造电子菜单板，打造顾客在第三空间体验中的全新沟通界面，塑造充满个性与温暖的数字化第三空间体验。目前，星巴克中国除极少部分受条件限制的门店外，绝大多数门店目前已完成升级改造。

It's worth mentioning that Starbucks recently launched a breakfast pilot project in the Shenzhen market, and the implementation and advancement of this project are deeply empowered by SITC's technological capabilities. 值得一提的是，星巴克近期在深圳市场启动了早餐测试项目，这一项目的落地与推进，背后也有来自 SITC 科技能力的深度赋能。

Through SITC's analysis and feedback, Starbucks has introduced 'Daily Black Coffee' and 'Daily Milk Coffee,' which are more suitable for meals and have a smoother taste, along with a rich variety of food pairings. Prices have also been optimized and adjusted based on the high-frequency repurchase characteristics of breakfast consumers. 通过 SITC 的分析反馈，星巴克推出了更适合佐餐、口感更顺滑的「每日黑咖」和「每日奶咖」，以及丰富的食品搭配组合，并根据早餐人群高频次复购的特点，对价格进行了优化调整。

item.title: 平遥电影展官方展映单元片单公布
item.guid: 平遥电影展官方展映单元片单公布
item.description:
Yesterday, the 9th Pingyao International Film Festival announced its official screening unit film list to the world, with 30% of the films being world premieres, 65% being Asian premieres, and a 100% Chinese premiere rate. 昨日，第九届平遥国际电影展面向全球公布本届电影展官方展映单元片单，其中 30% 的影片为全球首映，65% 的影片为亚洲首映，中国首映率则为 100%。

According to China News Service, among the shortlisted films, 18 are debut feature films by emerging directors. Specifically, 8 of the 11 films shortlisted in the 'Hidden Dragon' section are first works by new directors. In addition to the list announced today, the 9th Pingyao International Film Festival will also separately announce the opening and closing films and the 'Pingyao Surprise' films before the opening. 据中国新闻网报道，入围影片中，共有 18 部影片是新锐导演的首部长片作品。其中，「藏龙」单元的11部入围影片中有 8 部为新导演首作。在今日公布的片单之外，第九届平遥国际电影展还将于开幕前另行公布开、闭幕影片及「平遥惊喜」影片。

The 'Hidden Dragon' and 'Crouching Tiger' sections respectively focus on new Chinese-language and international director works, aiming to discover emerging directors' first, second, or third films, as well as the debut feature films of documentary directors. Specifically: 「藏龙」和「卧虎」单元分别聚焦华语和国际新导演作品，旨在发掘新锐导演的首作、第二部或第三部电影，也包括纪录片导演的剧情片首作。具体来看：

    Hidden Dragon: 11 films including "Eight or Nine O'Clock," "About 12 Days Ago," "Mom and Seven Days," "Indeed," "The Core," etc.;

  • 卧虎：《总统的蛋糕》《迷失之地》《父影之下》《狐步》《为了亚当》等 11 部。

而在「首映」单元方面，将展映九部全球范围内的年度重要导演作品和备受关注的优秀影片。首映单元的揭幕片是由保罗·托马斯·安德森执导，莱昂纳多·迪卡普里奥等主演的电影《一战再战》，该片将于平遥进行亚洲首映。其他影片方面：《密探》《情感价值》《旅途中的日子》《女人和孩子》等。

本届平遥影展以「汇合点」为主题，将于 9 月 24 日至 30 日举行。

item.title: 《绮梦之旅》 定档 10 月
item.guid: 《绮梦之旅》-定档-10-月
item.description:
日前，奇幻爱情电影《绮梦之旅》 中国大陆定档 10 月 18 日上映。

故事围绕婚礼邂逅的陌生人莎拉与大卫展开，两人通过神秘 GPS 装置开启时空之门，穿梭至高中告白、母亲重逢等人生关键场景，展开重历过往与抉择未来的奇幻旅程。影片通过时空穿越设定串联起人物情感脉络，呈现现实与记忆交织的冒险历程。

影片由郭共达执导，赛斯·瑞斯编剧，科林·法瑞尔、玛格特·罗比、菲比·沃勒-布里奇、哈米什·林克莱特等主演。

item.title: 影片《731》预售总票房突破亿
item.guid: 影片《731》预售总票房突破亿
item.description:
据灯塔专业版，截至 9 月 16 日 18 时 44 分，影片《731》预售总票房突破 1 亿，同时也成为今年春节档后首部预售票房突破 1 亿（不含点映）的影片。

该片主要讲述了在抗战胜利前夕，侵华日军为了扭转战局在我国东北哈尔滨平房区开展细菌战研究，屠戮百姓进行人体实验的故事。

《731》由山东省委宣传部、吉林省委宣传部、黑龙江省委宣传部、哈尔滨市委宣传部、青岛市委宣传部联合制作，长春电影集团等联合出品，赵林山执导，赵林山、刘恒编剧，姜武、王志文、李乃文领衔主演。
